name: The Gauntlet (NPIRE Games)
description:
MUST Play with Controllers :

Compatible with Xbox 360, Xbox One and Dualshock 4

The Gauntlet is a 3D, slightly competitive, multiplayer party game with multiple mini-games, putting twists on classics, to suit a variety of demographics. We have considered online but due to time constraints, we will focus on offline couch play.

The main game is played through in a ladder, Olympic type mode where players go through every mini-game and earn medals/points where a winner is decided at the end of all competitions and praised on a podium. 

The other mode will be slightly more relaxed, it's called Freeplay and the players choose their favourite games to play to keep up our replayability.
